allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add full card management with code syntax highlighting

- Add CodeMirror integration for syntax highlighting \(12+ languages\)
- Create CardModal component for viewing/editing cards with TEXT/CODE types
- Update DeckView with search, tag filtering \(AND/OR\), and card modal
- Enhance StudyMode with 3D flip animation, touch gestures, shuffle/restart
- Add import deck button to Dashboard
- Implement tag API endpoints in Rust backend
- Add import/export functionality with offline sync support
- Add tauri-plugin-dialog and tauri-plugin-fs for file operations

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
